Name: γ Crv
Notes:
Gienah Corvi, Gienah, Gienah Ghurab, Djenah al Ghyrab al Eymen, Dextra ala 
Corvi;[1] suspected variable, *V*max = 2.56m, *V*min = 2.60m

Name: δ Crv
Notes:
Algorab, Algoral, Algorel, Algores; double star; suspected variable, *V*max 
= 2.91m, *V*min = 2.96m

Name: α Crv
Notes:
Al Chiba, Al Minliar al Ghurab, Alchiba, Alchita, Alkhiba, Minkar al 
Ghyrab, Rostrum Corvi;[1]

Name: ζ Crv
Notes: Chang Sha (長沙);[2] emission-line star; double star, suspected variable

Name: 31 Crt
Notes:
spectroscopic binary; rotating ellipsoidal variable; once mistaken for a moon 
of Mercury
